full_summary:
\# Government Tender Announcement

### Item Details

* **Title:** Hose Assembly, Nonmetallic Parts Kit
* **Description:** The Department of National Defence invites proposals for a nonmetallic parts kit and hose assembly. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
* **Item ID:** 01-2937060; Part No.: AE20074-010
* **Contractor:** EATON AEROQUIP LLC (NCAGE: 00624) or DANFOSS POWER SOLUTIONS II, LLC (NCAGE: 01276) or MINISTRY OF DEFENCE, FUTURE AIRCRAFT CARRIER IPT (CVF IPT) (NCAGE: KCUC6)
* **Quantity:** 1
* **Unit of Issue:** AY
* **Language Preference:** English or French

### Competitive Tendering Details

* **Tender Documents:** Available at [Canada Buy](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38981/w8482-252684---amendment-003-eng.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38981/w8482-252684---amendment-002-eng.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38981/w8482-252684-rfp-amendment-eng.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38981/w8482-252684---english-rfp-clauses.pdf)
* **Language Preference:** Both official languages of Canada
* **Currencies:** Bids must be in Canadian dollars. Foreign currencies will not be accepted.
* **Exchange Rate Fluctuation Risk:** Not applicable. Specified bids with requests for exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation will not be considered.
* **Respondent Requirements:** Equivalent or substitute products must be indicated with brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE.

### Official Details

* **Tender Status:** Cancelled
* **Notice Type:** Notice of Proposed Procurement
* **Procurement Category:** *Scheduled*
* **Trade Agreements:** No specified trade agreements
* **Regions of Oppty:** Global
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia
* **Contact Info:** Line Sarazin, line.sarazin@forces.gc.ca, (555) 555-5555
